snippet: At least three other Americans were wounded in the latest outbreak of “green on blue” violence, this time at a military depot near Kabul....
abstract: United States and Afghan officials say two Americans, including one service member, were killed and three other Americans wounded after Afghan soldier opened fire at military depot near Kabul.

byline.contributor: Jawad Sukhanyar and Fahim Abed contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: At least three other Americans were wounded in the latest outbreak of “green on blue” violence, this time at a military depot near Kabul.

headline.main: Attack in Afghanistan by Afghan Soldier Kills 2 Americans
headline.print_headline: Afghan Soldier Opens Fire, Killing Two Americans

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
